remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仅从转换 。The class only converts from . 尝试获取结果时采用各种方法。Various techniques are employed in an attempt to obtain a result. `typeDescriptorContext` 将检查各种服务，包括 、 和 。`typeDescriptorContext` is checked for various services including , , and . 对于上的 WPF 注册路由事件的内部列表，还会检查提供的字符串 。The provided string is also checked against the internal list of WPF registered routed events on . 如果所有这些尝试都无法解决， 则会引发。If all these attempts fail to resolve, is thrown.
